content.text1: We’re a church that exists to grow loving communities of Jesus-followers who live and share his irreligious message. We value community, simplicity, and peace, with a mission to share the gospel and care for people.
content.text2: Our vision is to introduce spiritually curious people to the Jesus-centred life, through a movement of Jesus-centred churches.

content.text1: We belong to a denomination called Be In Christ Church of Canada, with roots in the Anabaptist and Wesleyan traditions that value simplicity, peacemaking, and living out the teaching of Jesus in daily life.  For a detailed list and description of our doctrinal statements, please visit http://www.canadianbic.ca/about-us/.
We've got some good people—and because we work for a church, we kind of have to be nice to you.

Overseers are a group of Elders selected to represent and oversee the entire ministry of The Meeting House. Our senior staff report to this team, and they focus on our vision and values while also ensuring we are financially responsible according to charitable law and are healthy and growing as a community..

content.text1: We’re a group of Jesus followers who believe the time is right to unite, equip, and amplify a movement that is all about Jesus. We believe a more connected, relational network of churches and leaders could give greater unity, voice, and visibility to this Jesus-centred, third-way movement, develop and support future-ready leaders, and equip more churches to make more disciples in a post-Christian context.
